resources.string: This is a Shopping List App. This App allows users to keep track of the items that they have to buy according to the category of item, the name of the shop including the map, and the quantity.

This App is convenient for its users especially if they tend to forget what items they have to buy while shopping. Therefore, whenever they have to purchase an item, they can use this app to input the item into the shopping list so that, the next time they decide to go shopping, they will know what items to buy and where to buy them.
